abstract: Robert Topolski simply wanted to share digital recordings of barber shop quartets with his buddies. When Comcast stopped him, he got the Federal Communications Commission involved. The second commission meeting on the issue, in Palo Alto, Calif., included renowned law professors and computer scientists –and the Raging Grannies.

headline.main: The Raging Grannies Greet the F.C.C.
